channel.title: Pages on Belgian Network Research Meeting
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Belgian Network Research Meeting

item.title: Location and Contact
item.description:
Location The BeNet 2017 meeting will be held in the language school Vzw Roeland. Address: Krijgslaan 18, 9000 Ghent.
Contacts For any question or request please contact Daniele Marinazzo or Julie Birkholz

item.title: Registration
item.description: Important dates Abstract submission Sun, Nov 26, 2017 (both oral and poster contributions) Notification of acceptance Thu, Nov 30, 2017 Registration Fri, Dec 1, 2017 Call for abstracts Oral and poster contribution are welcome, please refer to EasyChair for submissions. Oral contributions: short talks abstracts (20 minutes including questions) should be submitted to EasyChair in text format (no more than 300 words).
